committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the week of June 29 through July 5 as Why I Love America Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to designate the week of June 29 through July 5 each year as "Why I Love America Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the week of June 29 through July 5 as Why I Love America Week.
